title: 2nd Annual Golden Tote Holiday Shopping Event
desc: Golden Tote, an online clothing boutique that ships monthly totes of clothing to your door.? Golden Tote has a team of stylists that hand-pick items based on an extensive style profile, which is filled out by you. This event is a unique opportunity to shop for individual items or work with a stylist in person to curate a tote filled with clothing based on your profile. The shopping boutique includes clothing, accessories, shoes & jewelry such items as outerwear, sweaters, dresses and tops and a variety of gift sets.? Prices range from $5-$75. Other vendors include clothing by Puella, a Los Angeles based line designed by co-founders Sarah Becker & Sarah Sweeney; Beauty Counter, the all non-toxic beauty line; Jewelry from designer Jules Smith, and wine poured by Club W, a personalized wine club. Finish up your holiday shopping or get a little something for yourself! *We recommend taking an Uber or a cab on Friday, as street parking will be very limited. Street parking available on Saturday.
